name: yes 2: the unfinished sequel no one wanted!
name_original: yes 2: the unfinished sequel no one wanted!
description:
NOTE: this page for the game was kinda made in a rush so sorry it looks bad lol.

I'll fix it later maybe.

plot: after the events of yes 1, Shapeton is taking a break but then it turns out the red dudes have a secret base that Shapeton needs to get rid of. can he save all the green dudes again?

Yes 2 is basically yes 1 but it doesn't suck. that's it
Ok I'm going to be real with you. this game is unfinished. I had a much wider vision for this but I had lack of motivation and I just wanted to get it out of the way. But I hope you can still enjoy it!

that's it I don't have a a lot to say

It also includes yes 1 and a bonus SRB2 Shapeton mod!
